description: Troubleshoot the startup of an Azure Virtual Machine.

commands.name: az vm boot-diagnostics disable
commands.summary: Disable the boot diagnostics on a VM.
examples: az vm boot-diagnostics disable --ids $(az vm list -g MyResourceGroup --query "[].id" -o tsv)
az vm boot-diagnostics disable --ids $(az vm list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --query "[].id" -o tsv) --name MyVirtualMachine --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az vm boot-diagnostics enable
commands.summary: Enable the boot diagnostics on a VM.
examples: az vm boot-diagnostics enable --storage https://mystor.blob.core.windows.net/ --ids $(az vm list -g MyResourceGroup --query "[].id" -o tsv)
az vm boot-diagnostics enable --name MyVirtualMachine --resource-group MyResourceGroup --storage https://mystor.blob.core.windows.net/

commands.name: az vm boot-diagnostics get-boot-log
commands.summary: Get the boot diagnostics log from a VM.
examples: az vm boot-diagnostics get-boot-log --ids $(az vm list -g MyResourceGroup --query "[].id" -o tsv)
az vm boot-diagnostics get-boot-log --name MyVirtualMachine --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az vm boot-diagnostics get-boot-log-uris
commands.summary: Get SAS URIs for a virtual machine's boot diagnostic logs.
examples: az vm boot-diagnostics get-boot-log-uris -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVirtualMachine
